Updated review: it's been a long on and off type of game, but it is fun to play with friends and enjoy trying to survive together and scream obscenities when the killer facecamps/tunnels. 
Killers will always be more OP and get more bloodpoints than survivors in many games, the hit boxes are still broken, killers will DC if they cannot tunnel/facecamp, there's no harsh setbacks or penalties for DC-ing, but hey upside is...the faces of the survivors aren't crazy looking anymore.
I love the game on how unique it feels.  I love playing killers the only thing that bothers me is how more powerful survivors are vs killers.  That is my only complaint.

Tom and Jerry classic cat and mouse.

The game at its core is a very fun and competitive game. It can be enjoyed by yourself or with a group of friends. Like most games it comes with bugs or toxic players. But that aside this game is genuinely fun!

I play  this game on PS4 and I do not recommend it. While the concept is fun there is too many abusable strategies (mainly keys, anotated blueprint and moris) and it's one of the buggiest game I have ever seen. When a new patch releases  it's often impossible to play it at all due to severe major issues like the hooks not working or the framerate being below 10 fps. 

Some design decision are also very questionable, as well as the balance of the game. 
Overall I'd say stay away from it, you'll just end up disappointed.

Takes a lot of processing power, but it is a very fun game. I would recommend this game to people that are about 14+ because it has a little gore but that is really all. It has very good sound and suspense that adds to the horror factor of this game. As a killer you are in a first person view and your goal is to hit survivors twice and then put them on sacrificial hooks, you have a special ability that will help you with this goal and will make your job easier. As a survivor you are in a third person view and you have to fix 5 generators while there are 7 on the map so that you can open the exit gates (there are two on the map) to escape, you have no special ability, but you can equip items to make your game easier, and if you are the last survivor, you can try to go through a hatch that spawns after you become the last survivor but the killer can lock this which enables you to open the exit gates and escape. There are 4 survivors and 1 killer in each match, and there is a lot of DLC and many options for killer and survivor. This game gets a 9.5/10 for me. There are a few bugs in the game but overall it is a very well made game.

game is extremely fun and addicting. Gameplay loop is suprisingly robust and allows for great experimentation. Learning curve is very high but new players will pick it up quickly. Both killer and survivor are very fun, almost like having two seperate games within the game. DLC content is beneficial, but not required to enjoy the game and are more an option if you think its worth it. DLC is also frequently on sale and waiting for one of these will allow you to experience hundreds if not thousands of hours of fun, for the price of one or two triple A titles.

Game is great sometimes. It's unfortunate that they still haven't figured out how to balance connection and killer gets 'host' every game. When playing survivor, where you see yourself is not where you are. On the killer's side, you are probably 2-3 body lengths behind where you see you are. It's not uncommon for a hit to connect with you even if you aren't there. I keep playing hoping it'll be fixed one day, but we're talking about BHVR here... Quantity > Quality. Game's still shit, BHVR. Get it together.

An sich ein gutes und spannendes Game. Leider viel zu lange Ladezeiten. Teilweise wartet man über 10min auf eine Lobby. Egal ob Crossplay oder net. Die Wartezeiten bleiben so lange. Grafisch ist das Game in Ordnung aber nicht wirklich spektakulär. An sich macht das Game fun wenn nicht gerade eine Killer Campen ist. Da gibt es leider keine Regelung für. Teilweise packen auch die Killer einen durch das Fenster und man bagt einfach durch obwohl man schon weit weg ist. Zum Zwischendurch zocken auf jeden fall trotzdem zu empfehlen. Aber die Ladezeiten müsen gekürzt werden.

Hab die Review  übrigens während der Ladezeit geschrieben, nur so als Orientirerung :)

Игра интересная и прикольная, затрагивает на множество часов. По началу игра лёгкая, перков у сурвов и манов не много так что можно спокойно разучить механики игры и маньяков. Но чем больше играешь тем больше перков становится доступно, некоторые из них дизбалансные например: Решающий удар(осколок), который(если у тебя прямые руки) может спасти тебя от второго повешанья. И с начала 15-5 рангов начинается клоунада в которой сурвы звери а ман дрессировщик. Мементо мори у маньяков, фиолетовый и красный ключ у сурвов это все дизбаланс который убивает игру. Ещё одной проблемой есть пинг например иза пинга ты можешь не вовремя прожать перктипа спринта или крепкого орешка которые могут защитить тебя от ранения. Но мне нравится как они решили проблему с проверками реакций при высоком ринге. Проверка не будет выскакивать если у тебя пинг за 100-150 и это помогает. Ну а так игра довольно веселая если играть в пати за сурвов или играть с фан Биллом за мана. Удачи!
